QuestData.Title: The Days Are Just Packed
QuestData.Description: Hello there! Would you mind checking on someone for me?$b$bSergeant Calvin was supposed to meet me here. We were going to go out looking for new alchemical reagents, but he hasn't shown up yet.$B$BI know the militia has been really busy lately so I guess he's busy, but he should still be in Brennadam Square. Would you mind checking in on him?
QuestData.LogDescription: Find Sergeant Calvin in Brennadam Square.
